markings: on bottom, on label: [19D]; on bottom: collector's label; on bottom, on label: [rare Lambeth Delft Dated Jug, with lobed pear-shaped body/.lue with initials ZEW 1686 within a cartouche/ surmounted flanked by griffins and above a cherubs head and tassels/ Although this bears a resemblance to the Dutch decoration/ seen on a plate illustrated by Hudig, Deltter Fayence, fig. 76/ it is much closer to the decoration on a Lambeth plate/ illustrated by Rackham, Catalog of the Glaiser collection, / pl. 89C, no. 1351. For the shape see same Catalogue, pl./ 86A, no. 1336, where a jug dated 1682 is illustrated.]
title: Jug
